instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: Did you see the science fair list? I'm paired with Maya again!
B: That's awesome. Are you building another volcano?
A: Nah, we're doing a plant maze. I already started sketching it in my notebook during homeroom.
B: Sounds fun. Are you free after band practice to test it?
A: Totally, mom said I can hang at your place until dinner.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I'm trying to finish this book report before our class trip.
B: The one on Percy Jackson?
A: Yeah, Ms. Ortiz said we have to include our favorite myth, so I'm drawing a comic strip too.
B: Nice! Are you nervous about presenting?
A: A little, but it's only for homeroom so it should be chill.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: Coach just posted the new swim meet times and mine got faster by three seconds!
B: Sweet! Did you change your stroke?
A: I practiced turns in the community pool every morning before school this week.
B: Dedication pays off. Think you'll make the regional team?
A: Maybe if I keep waking up at 5:45, even though dad keeps laughing about how early it is.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: We have to memorize the state capitals for a quiz tomorrow.
B: Do you have a trick for it?
A: I made flashcards with doodles during art class, so now I remember Juneau because I drew a giant snowman.
B: That's clever. Are you bringing them on the bus?
A: Yup, gonna quiz everyone in the back row.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I have SAT prep tonight after soccer practice, so I won't get home until like nine.
B: Rough. Are you still aiming for engineering schools?
A: Yeah, guidance counselor thinks I can swing it if I keep my GPA up and nail the essay.
B: Remember to mention the robotics club competition.
A: Definitely, that build season basically took over my junior year.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I just got my learner's permit, but dad keeps tapping an imaginary brake when I drive.
B: Haha, same with my mom. Have you tried parking yet?
A: Only in the empty lot behind the grocery store. Parallel parking is terrifying.
B: You'll get it before the road test.
A: Hopefully, because I want to drive to prom senior year.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: My AP Lit teacher assigned another novel and we barely finished the last one.
B: Which book now?
A: Their Eyes Were Watching God. It's good, but balancing that with debate tournaments is brutal.
B: Do you still have weekend rehearsals for the play?
A: Yep, tech week starts Friday, so sleep is a myth at this point.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: Guidance counselor wants me to finalize my senior schedule, but I still can't pick between AP Bio and dual-enrollment stats.
B: Depends on what major you're leaning toward.
A: That's the thing—I like journalism, but also low-key enjoy anatomy labs.
B: Maybe shadow someone in both fields this summer.
A: Good call, once finals are done I'll email a few local offices.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I just wrapped my sociology midterm and sprinted to my coffee shift. College life is chaos.
B: Are you still taking 18 credits?
A: Yeah, senior advisor said it keeps me on track for the journalism minor.
B: At least you get free espresso.
A: True, but closing the café at midnight and then writing a media analysis is a whole mood.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: My internship supervisor wants a prototype by Friday and my capstone team still hasn't merged our code.
B: That's grad school crunch for you.
A: I knew a dual-degree would be heavy, but balancing studio crits with machine learning labs is wild.
B: At least the portfolio will look stacked.
A: Yeah, once I survive this all-nighter at the campus makerspace.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: We finally got approved for the study abroad trip, so I'm budgeting like crazy.
B: Where are you headed?
A: Madrid for a semester. I'm selling old textbooks and doing extra shifts at the tutoring center.
B: Sounds worth it. Did financial aid cover housing?
A: Partially, so I'm also applying for the language department scholarship tonight.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: My roommates and I just signed a lease off-campus, so I'm finally escaping dorm life.
B: Congrats! Did you find furniture yet?
A: Not really, we're scavenging thrift stores between finals.
B: Adulting on a student budget is rough.
A: Tell me about it. At least utilities are split four ways.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I had back-to-back product standups and still need to finish the slide deck for tomorrow's client pitch.
B: Startup grind never stops.
A: Yeah, but if we close this series A extension, the stock options might actually mean something.
B: Are you still mentoring the new hires?
A: Yep, onboarding three engineers while planning my own wedding is a circus.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: Daycare called because Maya caught another cold, so I logged off early to make soup.
B: Working remotely has its perks.
A: True, but juggling sprint planning with a toddler in the background is hectic.
B: Did your partner get back from the business trip?
A: Not until Thursday, so I'm living on coffee and instant pot meals.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I'm training for my first marathon while leading the marketing rebrand, so every morning starts at 5 a.m.
B: That's intense. How's the new campaign?
A: Launching next month. I'm coordinating influencers, paid ads, and our podcast sponsor slots.
B: At least running keeps the stress in check.
A: For sure, those long runs are my therapy sessions.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I'm debating whether to accept the relocation package to Berlin.
B: That's a big move.
A: Yeah, but leading the European design team could fast-track me to creative director.
B: How does your partner feel?
A: Supportive, as long as we can find dog-friendly housing and figure out visas quickly.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I spent my lunch break on a parent-teacher conference call and then jumped into a budget review.
B: Hybrid life. How are the kids doing?
A: Fourth grader is thriving, but middle-school math homework keeps landing in my inbox.
B: At least your project timeline eased up.
A: Slightly, though our VP just added another compliance audit to my plate.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: My back still hurts from coaching the U10 soccer team all weekend.
B: That's what you get for volunteering.
A: The kids loved it, but combining that with quarter-end reporting was brutal.
B: Did you at least get some downtime?
A: Only long enough to meal prep for the week and help with a science fair diorama.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: We're refinancing the house while coordinating our daughter's theater rehearsals, so my calendar looks like a Tetris board.
B: Home ownership adventures.
A: Yep, plus I'm mentoring two analysts through their first big product launch.
B: At least you have vacation time soon.
A: If I can get through these performance reviews first.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I finally scheduled that preventative health screening the HR portal kept nagging me about.
B: Did they give you the afternoon off?
A: Yeah, but I spent it comparing 529 plans for the kids.
B: Classic. How's the new director responding to your roadmap?
A: Mostly supportive, as long as I keep the release aligned with Q4 targets.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I'm helping my son compare colleges while also preparing for the board presentation next week.
B: That sounds intense.
A: It is, especially because my mother moved in temporarily after her surgery.
B: Are you still leading the digital transformation project?
A: Yep, and the consultants keep adding slide decks to review every night.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I spent Saturday at a college reunion and Sunday fixing the leaky faucet because the plumber was booked.
B: Handy and nostalgic.
A: Yeah, but now I'm behind on reviewing the quarterly P&L.
B: Can't you delegate?
A: Not really, since I'm the only VP who understands the legacy system we're retiring.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: My youngest just got her driver's license, so now we're negotiating who gets which car.
B: That's a milestone.
A: It is, but insurance premiums jumped and I'm still funding two 529 plans.
B: Ouch. How's work?
A: Busy—we're reorganizing the entire sales region before fiscal year close.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I'm prepping to teach the new hire leadership course while planning my 25th anniversary trip.
B: Multitasking goals.
A: Thanks, but between elder-care logistics and quarterly earnings calls, it's a lot.
B: Are you taking actual time off?
A: Trying to, but clients keep sneaking meetings onto the calendar.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: HR just sent me paperwork about phased retirement options, which feels surreal.
B: Are you considering it?
A: Maybe. I'd like more time to visit my grandkids but still consult on policy work.
B: Makes sense.
A: Plus, I'm chairing the diversity task force until the new director gets up to speed.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I spent the weekend helping my daughter paint her new condo and now my shoulders are protesting.
B: Home improvement bonding.
A: Definitely, though it meant I had to finish the nonprofit grant proposal at midnight.
B: Are you still mentoring that new VP?
A: Yes, succession planning never ends.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: My financial planner keeps asking when I want to draw from the 401(k), but I'm not ready to slow down.
B: Still loving the work?
A: Yeah, leading the healthcare initiative is energizing, even if the travel is tiring.
B: How's the knee after that hiking trip?
A: Getting better after physical therapy twice a week.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I just celebrated my 30-year work anniversary, and the team surprised me with a scrapbook of every product launch.
B: That's amazing.
A: It is, but now I'm focused on coaching my successor before next fiscal year.
B: Any travel plans?
A: Taking a river cruise after we finish the ERP migration.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: Retirement has been busy—I joined a memoir writing class and volunteer at the library twice a week.
B: Sounds fulfilling.
A: It is, though I'm still consulting occasionally when the firm needs historical context.
B: Do you miss the office?
A: Sometimes, but morning walks with the grandkids make up for it.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I'm planning a cross-country rail trip now that the garden is finally self-sustaining.
B: That's goals.
A: Yeah, after teaching for four decades, it's nice to take my time visiting former students.
B: Are you still leading the local history club?
A: Of course, we're archiving old newspapers next month.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: The doctor cleared me to return to pickleball, so I'm celebrating with extra laps at the pool.
B: Love that energy.
A: Staying active keeps my joints from stiffening, and it gives me stories to share at the grandparent book club.
B: Still tutoring math?
A: Yep, can't resist helping the neighborhood kids prep for exams.

instruction: Given the following conversation, guess the most likely age range of the primary speaker. Choose from: 10-13, 14-17, 18-24, 25-34, 35-44, 45-54, 55-64, 65-75.
input:
A: I'm organizing the community theater's 50th anniversary show, so I'm back in rehearsal halls after decades away.
B: That's incredible.
A: Retirement freed up my calendar, but coordinating volunteers is still like herding cats.
B: At least you know the ropes.
A: For sure, my old stage manager notes finally came in handy again.
